column2: "Hey you! Have we met before? We haven't? Well, it doesn't really matter!"

"Your face tells me want new information.
You want it, right? You need it, right?"
"Well, meet Team Patty and Tea, information dealers extraordinaire! Number one among the ARKS! That's us, by the way."
"Don't mind her, that's only what Patty calls it."
"But we really do gather information, like about the strange Darkers spotted on Naberius."
"Yes, exactly! The rumored searching Darkers... Much stronger than normal Darkers! Allegedly."
"That something-something team got done in by them. Scary, right? Really unsettling!"
"We heard the rumor and are searching for them, but for better or worse, we haven't found anything yet."
"They rarely ever show themselves, so maybe they have some goal other than fighting the ARKS..."
"But what could they be after!? If you find anything, be sure to tell us!"
